sentences.english: Maybe you have missed the main chance .
sentences.chinese: 沒準兒你放跑了一個大好機會。

sentences.english: Why not have a try? Maybe you will lose a good chance.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼不試試？沒準兒你放跑了一個大好機會。

sentences.english: They might even think that’s it out of control.
sentences.chinese: 你們也許還會想我的生活沒準兒失控了。

sentences.english: This is it-this is probably permanent.
sentences.chinese: 就是這樣，這沒準兒是持久不變的了。

sentences.english: It may cure him of his bad habit.
sentences.chinese: 沒準兒可以改掉他的壞習慣。

sentences.english: What may be bad for the waistline may be good for the wallet.
sentences.chinese: 對腰身不利的沒準兒有利錢包。

sentences.english: Maybe I can solve this mystery.
sentences.chinese: 沒準兒我能解開這個謎。

sentences.english: Maybe he's just a guy who hates going to the barber.
sentences.chinese: 沒準兒他也就是個討厭上理髮店的傢伙而已。

sentences.english: You never know. You could become the next watermelon seed-spitting world champion.
sentences.chinese: 誰知道呢，沒準兒你就是下一屆的吐西瓜籽世界冠軍。
